originalText.text: Industrious Hudson Yards is a great place to work! From its incredible views to wonderful staff, its the best office space in the city. Sean and Anna always go above and beyond for the members, you couldn't be in better hands! Our firm has been here since 2020, and Industrious has supported our growth every step of the way!

text.text: Industrious Hudson Yards is a great place to work! From its incredible views to wonderful staff, its the best office space in the city. Sean and Anna always go above and beyond for the members, you couldn't be in better hands! Our firm has been here since 2020, and Industrious has supported our growth every step of the way!

originalText.text: With the very best architecture and locations in the U.S. new management is targeting new members and evicting them. The situation seems to be related to the current shift in assets of othe Coworking spaces such as We Work and other CoWorking spaces. I just spoke with Regional Manager Angel White who is on vacation and working remotely to tell me I was evicted. They are abusing landlord rights and can only stall in their private space for so long. Not sue what happened there but it's a U.S. Federal case now. Please take notes and prepare to deal with legal issues, NDA's and possible bankruptcy.

originalText.text: The Equinox/Hudson Yards Industrious location is the best location of theirs I’ve visited! Sean and Anna are just delightful and a pleasure to see everyday. Very happy to be a member here.

text.text: The Equinox/Hudson Yards Industrious location is the best location of theirs I’ve visited! Sean and Anna are just delightful and a pleasure to see everyday. Very happy to be a member here.

originalText.text: Industrious at the Hudson Yards is the place to be, our firm began here and has hit the ground running since this location opened. Sean and Ana have lent a helping hand since they joined the team, and the vibes only continue to get better.

text.text: Industrious at the Hudson Yards is the place to be, our firm began here and has hit the ground running since this location opened. Sean and Ana have lent a helping hand since they joined the team, and the vibes only continue to get better.

originalText.text: We have been looking for a coworking / flexible office space as we have been growing out of our main office space. We toured Industrious at Hudson Yards and were very impressed. They have a variety of office layouts, various conference rooms, private phone rooms and other useful amenities. Taylor S. gave us a tour and we were blown away with Taylor's professionalism and hospitality-- it truly stood out from the others we have met with during our search. It's clear that as a member here, the service is unparalleled. If you're looking for flexible office space for your team, we highly recommend seeing Industrious at the Hudson Yards location.
